channel.title: How to run rscd v25
channel.description:
First of all The Downloads:
- Apeache: [url=http://www.uniontransit.com/apache/ant/binaries/apache-ant-1.7.0-bin.zip]http://www.uniontransit.com/apache/ant/binaries/apache-ant-1.7.0-bin.zip[/url]
- Xampplite: [url=http://www.apachefriends.org/download.php?xampplite-win32-1.6.6a.zip]http://www.apachefriends.org/download.php?xampplite-win32-1.6.6a.zip[/url]
- Java JDK: [url=https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=java_ee_sdk-5_05-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer]https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=java_ee_sdk-5_05-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer[/url]
Place them all in C:/ (Not in the same folder)
RSCD v25:
- Rscd v25 Source [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/126396865/Rscd_v25.rar.html]http://rapidshare.com/files/126396865/Rscd_v25.rar.html[/url]
- Rscd v25 Www Files [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/126398705/www.rar.html]http://rapidshare.com/files/126398705/www.rar.html[/url]
- Rscd .sql Database [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/126399021/Rscd.rar.html]http://rapidshare.com/files/126399021/Rscd.rar.html[/url]
Step1: Start By going the the XAMPPLITE folders and double click on the setup_xampp Let it load and when its finished It should say (Press any key to continue) When its done you need to start Apeace and MySQL! Do this by clickin on the (xampp-control) And select (SVC APEACE AND SVC MYSQL) Then Press start on both if they are running its should say (RUNNING) with green text.
(IF YOR PORT 80 IS ALREADY INUSE YOU HAVE 1: close that program that uses port 80. 2 CHANGE APEACE TO USE AN OTHER PORT! To change port 80 go to C:\xampplite\apache\conf and open (httpd) WIth wordpack! Shearch for (Listen 80) and change it to (Listen 81) AND press apache_installservice.bat Now to see ur local website you have to type ([url=http://localhost:81/]http://localhost:81/[/url]) (ONLY DO THIS IF YOU CAN NOT CLOSE THAT USEING PORT 80)
Step2: Click on (APEACE ADMIN) and a website will popup! There you can choose your langh. When your done You will see your site its will be XAMPLITE's site! on the left side You see the menu CLICK on (Security) Then you will see a link ( => [url=http://localhost/security/xamppsecurity.php]http://localhost/security/xamppsecurity.php[/url] <= [allowed only for localhost] ) CLICK on it!
Choose a password Were it says:
MYSQL SECTION: "ROOT" PASSWORD
aND THEN SELECT (http) aND PRESS (Password changing)
Ok Now you have created Your HOST for the website and now we will add the (Database) If you made it port 81 You can click here: [url=http://localhost:81/phpmyadmin/]http://localhost:81/phpmyadmin/[/url] If not click here [url=http://localhost/phpmyadmin/]http://localhost/phpmyadmin/[/url]
If you see the different i don't have to explain about that more!
Enter ur name ROOT and your password that you choosed!
ok Now you are in your (DB)
unRAR You (SQL) its named (RSCD) In phpmyadmin its says Creat Database, enter RSCD there and Creat it! Press Import and then shearch for your RSCD.SQL. When its done it says say (imported bla bla files)
Step3: (Adding your website)
ok First of all go to C:\xampplite\htdocs And delete everything in it! Select Everything In your (WWW files) And past it into your (HTDOCS.folder) When your done sheach for you config.php file and open it with Notepack or whatever you use. [code] <?php
$db_type = 'mysql'; $db_host = 'localhost'; $db_name = 'rscd'; $db_username = 'root'; $db_password = ''; (ENTER YOU PW HERE) $db_prefix = ''; $p_connect = false;
$cookie_name = 'rscd_cookie'; $cookie_domain = ''; $cookie_path = '/'; $cookie_secure = 0; $cookie_seed = '3038997c';
define('PUN', 1); [/code]
To see if it works currectly You can type http:/localhost/ and see if your forum is there!
Step4 (Rscd server!)
Ok unback (Rscd v25) Do it in your dokomants
So when you done and you in the server folders theres a few things you need to change befor you can run it lets start with connections Open You (WORLD.XML) It looks like this: [code] <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <!DOCTYPE properties SYSTEM "http://java.sun.com/dtd/properties.dtd"> <properties>
<comment>RSCD Config</comment>
<entry key="version">31</entry> <entry key="ip">localhost</entry>
<entry key="port">43594</entry>
<entry key="name">RSCDaemon</entry>
<entry key="location">Scotland</entry>
<entry key="maxplayers">800</entry>
<entry key="servernum">30</entry>
<entry key="lsip">localhost</entry>
<entry key="lsport">34522</entry> </properties> [/code]
Where it Say LOCALHOST i usely change it to (MY) ip I suggest you do it to! When you done save it and close it! after that Open you (CONF.file) wich is named (LS) it looks like this: [code] <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <!DOCTYPE properties SYSTEM "http://java.sun.com/dtd/properties.dtd"> <properties>
<comment>RSCD-LS Config</comment>
<entry key="mysqlhost">localhost</entry> <entry key="mysqldb">rscd</entry>
<entry key="mysqluser">root</entry>
<entry key="mysqlpass">ENTERYOUPW</entry>
<entry key="lsip">localhost</entry>
<entry key="lsport">34522</entry>
<entry key="queryip">localhost</entry>
<entry key="queryport">8181</entry> </properties> [/code] It Looks almost the same BUT Enter you (IP) Where it says (LOCALHOST) again And enter you pw where it says
[code]<entry key="mysqlpass">ENTERYOUPW</entry>[/code] [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/bla.jpg[/img] OK Now it is currect NOW you need apeache to run it If you have saved apache in (C:/) You can copy this [code] @echo off set PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin set JAVA_HOME=c:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_05\bin\javaw.exe 1.6.0_05 ant runserver pause [/code] PAST this in YOU (RUN_SERVER.bat)
AND THIS IN YOU RUN_LSERVER.bat [code] @echo off set PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin set JAVA_HOME=c:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_05\bin\javaw.exe 1.6.0_05 ant runls pause [/code]
OK Befor we try this out there a small thing people miss and thats the TOOL.jar! If you have installed SUN jdk then it should be placed in :
C:\Sun\SDK\jdk\lib\tools.jar
copy Tools.jar and past it to :
C:\Program\Java\jre1.6.0_07\lib\tools.jar
Now you should be able to run you server double click on run_lserver and on run_server when they connected to eachother they should say connected to world 30 succeded
hope this helps and 100% credit to me.

Thanks
[/quote]

item.title: How to run rscd v25
item.dc:creator: @martinfin martinfin
item.description:
@martinfin wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:94, topic:234434”][quote author=martinfin link=topic=309101.msg3197471#msg3197471 date=1272933183]

Did I miss something? I looked and couldn’t find any commands for using this as Rank ADMIN… Are they the same as Noobscape???

Tia!

If you are using an EasyRSC based source, ie NOOBscape, then you don’t need to be in this topic.

I am in fact using Noobscape… but I also downloaded Rscd_v25 and using it as a test to see which is better.
I guess since I’m here replying to this I would like to ask this… Can any Client work with rscd_v25? If I edit the settings? Cause I got the Website working and Rscd_v25 working… but how would I distribute the Client when it is in the Server setup? Or could anyone tell me that I can copy certain files out of the setup to adjust to making a client…
All in all, I just wanted to say thanks for helping me in Noobscape version, everything is running smooth.
[/quote]

Hello martinfin,

Well, I wouldn’t exactly say it’s a matter of ‘which is better’. I mean, you can customize the server to be how ‘you’ want it to be. There’s downsides to using any source, whether it be RSCD based or EasyRSC.

There’s quite a few things to take into account, for example: If you are going to use an RSCD based server, you will need to have the knowledge to secure your website properly. Alternatively, there are a few people out there who will take payment for doing that for you.

Also, as with EasyRSC, one issue you may find (depending on how much you are planning on updating things that require saving), then there could well possibly be a lot of manual editing to the player’s CFG files.

These are just two simple examples, but there will be more…

Anyhow, you’re more than welcome for the help, and if you need any help or have any questions, don’t hesitate to PM me. I will answer them as best I can, and point you in the right direction.[/quote]

Wow, Interesting thoughts… I’m new to MySql and backing up b4 I had formatted. But I was able to salvage things, Now I am having errors tho… But thats enough said on that, You’re right, I would rather have someone to secure it.
Anyhow, Server is going good… But does lock up at times, not letting anyone on. (Noobscape) I’ll keep an eye on it and see what happens for awhile.

Read full topic

item.title: How to run rscd v25
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“martinfin, post:93, topic:234434”][quote author=yong min link=topic=309101.msg3193691#msg3193691 date=1272540028]

Did I miss something? I looked and couldn’t find any commands for using this as Rank ADMIN… Are they the same as Noobscape???

Tia!

If you are using an EasyRSC based source, ie NOOBscape, then you don’t need to be in this topic.
[/quote]

I am in fact using Noobscape… but I also downloaded Rscd_v25 and using it as a test to see which is better.
I guess since I’m here replying to this I would like to ask this… Can any Client work with rscd_v25? If I edit the settings? Cause I got the Website working and Rscd_v25 working… but how would I distribute the Client when it is in the Server setup? Or could anyone tell me that I can copy certain files out of the setup to adjust to making a client…
All in all, I just wanted to say thanks for helping me in Noobscape version, everything is running smooth.[/quote]

Hello martinfin,

Well, I wouldn’t exactly say it’s a matter of ‘which is better’. I mean, you can customize the server to be how ‘you’ want it to be. There’s downsides to using any source, whether it be RSCD based or EasyRSC.

There’s quite a few things to take into account, for example: If you are going to use an RSCD based server, you will need to have the knowledge to secure your website properly. Alternatively, there are a few people out there who will take payment for doing that for you.

Also, as with EasyRSC, one issue you may find (depending on how much you are planning on updating things that require saving), then there could well possibly be a lot of manual editing to the player’s CFG files.

These are just two simple examples, but there will be more…

Anyhow, you’re more than welcome for the help, and if you need any help or have any questions, don’t hesitate to PM me. I will answer them as best I can, and point you in the right direction.

Read full topic

item.title: How to run rscd v25
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

universallas:

whats wrong with rscd v25 when register acc it is says redirecting and down in corner he is connecting to http://216.245.211.162/index.php but it is not my ip how to change it ?

  1. goto “phphmyadmin”
  2. click on config
  3. search for baseurl
  4. change it
  5. clean your forum cache
    done.

Read full topic
